channel.title: How do I add godsword stances on a delta 317?
channel.description: I hold meh godswords like dharok's stance. Everything was preset like that. I tried silent cj and SWAT but i got so many errors! I know about server side edits, but just to hld my godswords like an ordinary 2h would be fine! But plz help! Dont tell me to go get a 474 client cuz thats not happening.

item.title: How do I add godsword stances on a delta 317?
item.dc:creator: @24man30 24man30
item.description:
@24man30 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:9, topic:426871”]How you mean, the animation of special attacks?
then you just add them with other specials and put the right gfx[/quote] JESUS! NO! HOW TO HOLD THE GODSWORD IN 2 HANDS, NOT ON A SHOULDER! ALSO HOW TO ADD THE ANIMS! JESUS YOU GUYS ARE STUPID!

Read full topic
